```
    30‚Üí      // Add more mappings as needed

    32‚Üí    return pathToUtgMap[path] || 'utg_default';
    33‚Üí  };
    34‚Üí
    35‚Üí  const currentUtgId = utg_id || getUtgIdForPath(pathname || '');

    39‚Üí

    43‚Üí    if (coltempId) {
    44‚Üí      setActiveTemplateId(parseInt(coltempId));

    47‚Üí    } else {

    49‚Üí    }
    50‚Üí  }, []);
    51‚Üí

    53‚Üí    try {

    56‚Üí        .select('coltemp_id, coltemp_name, coltemp_category, coltemp_color, coltemp_icon, icon_name, icon_color, count_of_columns')

    58‚Üí
    59‚Üí      if (error) throw error;
    60‚Üí

    62‚Üí      const groupedData: {[key: string]: ColtempData[]} = {

    71‚Üí          groupedData[category].push(item);
    72‚Üí        }
    73‚Üí      });
    74‚Üí
    75‚Üí      setTemplates(groupedData);
    76‚Üí    } catch (error) {

    78‚Üí    } finally {
    79‚Üí      setLoading(false);
    80‚Üí    }
    81‚Üí  };
    82‚Üí

    85‚Üí    const slots = [];

    91‚Üí      
    92‚Üí      // Fill remaining 2 slots with database data

    94‚Üí        if (categoryData[i]) {
    95‚Üí          slots.push(categoryData[i]);
    96‚Üí        } else {
    97‚Üí          // Empty slot
    98‚Üí          slots.push({
    99‚Üí            coltemp_id: -1,
   100‚Üí            coltemp_name: null,
   101‚Üí            coltemp_category: null,
   102‚Üí            coltemp_color: null,
   103‚Üí            coltemp_icon: null,
   104‚Üí            icon_name: null,
   105‚Üí            icon_color: null,
   106‚Üí            count_of_columns: null
   107‚Üí          });
   108‚Üí        }
   109‚Üí      }

   112‚Üí      for (let i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
   113‚Üí        if (categoryData[i]) {
   114‚Üí          slots.push(categoryData[i]);
   115‚Üí        } else {
   116‚Üí          // Empty slot

   118‚Üí            coltemp_id: -1,

   127‚Üí        }

   130‚Üí

   132‚Üí  };
   133‚Üí
   134‚Üí  // Get overflow items (4th item onwards)
   135‚Üí  const getOverflowItems = (categoryData: ColtempData[], category: string) => {
   136‚Üí    // For range category, overflow starts from 3rd item (since first slot is hardcoded)
   137‚Üí    if (category === 'range') {
   138‚Üí      return categoryData.slice(2);
   139‚Üí    }
   140‚Üí    return categoryData.slice(3);
   141‚Üí  };
   142‚Üí
   143‚Üí  // Handler functions
   144‚Üí  const selectTemplate = (templateId: number, template: ColtempData) => {
   145‚Üí    setActiveTemplateId(templateId);
   146‚Üí    
   147‚Üí    // Update URL with the selected template
   148‚Üí    const url = new URL(window.location.href);
   149‚Üí    if (templateId === -999) {
   150‚Üí      url.searchParams.delete('coltemp_id');
   151‚Üí    } else {
   152‚Üí      url.searchParams.set('coltemp_id', templateId.toString());
   153‚Üí    }
   154‚Üí    window.history.replaceState({}, '', url.toString());
   155‚Üí    
   156‚Üí    // Emit event for template selection
   157‚Üí    CTCEventEmitter.emitTemplateSelected(templateId, template, currentUtgId);
   158‚Üí  };
   159‚Üí
   160‚Üí  const previewTemplate = (templateId: number | null) => {
   161‚Üí    setPreviewTemplateId(templateId);
   162‚Üí    
   163‚Üí    if (templateId === null) {
   164‚Üí      CTCEventEmitter.emitTemplatePreviewClear(currentUtgId);
   165‚Üí    } else {
   166‚Üí      // Find the template data
   167‚Üí      let template: ColtempData | null = null;
   168‚Üí      if (templateId === -999) {
   169‚Üí        template = ALL_COLUMNS_TEMPLATE;
   170‚Üí      } else {
   171‚Üí        // Search through all categories for the template
   172‚Üí        for (const category of CATEGORIES) {
   173‚Üí          const found = templates[category]?.find(t => t.coltemp_id === templateId);
   174‚Üí          if (found) {
   175‚Üí            template = found;
   176‚Üí            break;
   177‚Üí          }
   178‚Üí        }
   179‚Üí      }
   180‚Üí      
   181‚Üí      CTCEventEmitter.emitTemplatePreview(templateId, template, currentUtgId);
   182‚Üí    }
   183‚Üí  };
   184‚Üí
   185‚Üí  const showShendoCategory = (category: string) => {
   186‚Üí    setShendoCategory(category);
   187‚Üí    CTCEventEmitter.emitShendoShowCategory(category, currentUtgId);
   188‚Üí  };
   189‚Üí
   190‚Üí  const openCJ = (category: string) => {
   191‚Üí    const url = `/admin/coltempcommand?rel_utg_id=${currentUtgId}&page=1&coltemp_category=${category}`;
   192‚Üí    window.open(url, '_blank');
   193‚Üí  };
   194‚Üí
   195‚Üí  const toggleDropdown = (category: string) => {
   196‚Üí    setDropdownOpen(prev => ({
   197‚Üí      ...prev,
   198‚Üí      [category]: !prev[category]
   199‚Üí    }));
   200‚Üí  };
   201‚Üí
   202‚Üí  const handleShendoClick = (category: string) => {
   203‚Üí    showShendoCategory(category);
   204‚Üí  };
   205‚Üí
   206‚Üí  const state: CTCMasterState = {
   207‚Üí    templates,
   208‚Üí    activeTemplateId,
   209‚Üí    previewTemplateId,
   210‚Üí    shendoCategory,
   211‚Üí    dropdownOpen,
   212‚Üí    loading
   213‚Üí  };
   214‚Üí
   215‚Üí  const handlers: CTCMasterHandlers = {
   216‚Üí    selectTemplate,
   217‚Üí    previewTemplate,
   218‚Üí    showShendoCategory,
   219‚Üí    openCJ,
   220‚Üí    toggleDropdown,
   221‚Üí    handleShendoClick,
   222‚Üí    createSlots,
   223‚Üí    getOverflowItems,
   224‚Üí    currentUtgId
   225‚Üí  };
   226‚Üí
   227‚Üí  return (
   228‚Üí    <>
   229‚Üí      {children({ state, handlers })}
   230‚Üí    </>
   231‚Üí  );
   232‚Üí}
```

```
1‚Üíexport interface ColtempData {
     2‚Üí  coltemp_id: number;
     3‚Üí  coltemp_name: string | null;
     4‚Üí  coltemp_category: string | null;
     5‚Üí  coltemp_color: string | null;
     6‚Üí  coltemp_icon: string | null; // deprecated
     7‚Üí  icon_name: string | null;
     8‚Üí  icon_color: string | null;
     9‚Üí  count_of_columns: number | null;
    10‚Üí}
    11‚Üí
    12‚Üíexport interface Template {
    13‚Üí  id: number;
    14‚Üí  name: string;
    15‚Üí  category: 'personal' | 'range' | 'adminpublic';
    16‚Üí  color: string;
    17‚Üí  icon_name: string;
    18‚Üí  icon_color: string;
    19‚Üí  column_count: number;
    20‚Üí}
    21‚Üí
    22‚Üíexport interface CTCMasterState {
    23‚Üí  templates: { [key: string]: ColtempData[] };
    24‚Üí  activeTemplateId: number | null;
    25‚Üí  previewTemplateId: number | null;
    26‚Üí  shendoCategory: string | null;
    27‚Üí  dropdownOpen: { [key: string]: boolean };
    28‚Üí  loading: boolean;
    29‚Üí}
    30‚Üí
    31‚Üíexport interface CTCMasterHandlers {
    32‚Üí  selectTemplate: (templateId: number, template: ColtempData) => void;
    33‚Üí  previewTemplate: (templateId: number | null) => void;
    34‚Üí  showShendoCategory: (category: string) => void;
    35‚Üí  openCJ: (category: string) => void;
    36‚Üí  toggleDropdown: (category: string) => void;
    37‚Üí  handleShendoClick: (category: string) => void;
    38‚Üí  createSlots: (categoryData: ColtempData[], category: string) => ColtempData[];
    39‚Üí  getOverflowItems: (categoryData: ColtempData[], category: string) => ColtempData[];
    40‚Üí  currentUtgId: string;
    41‚Üí}
    42‚Üí
    43‚Üíexport interface CTCMasterProps {
    44‚Üí  utg_id?: string;
    45‚Üí  children: (props: {
    46‚Üí    state: CTCMasterState;
    47‚Üí    handlers: CTCMasterHandlers;
    48‚Üí  }) => React.ReactNode;
    49‚Üí}
    50‚Üí
    51‚Üíexport interface CTCButtonsProps {
    52‚Üí  templates: { [key: string]: ColtempData[] };

    54‚Üí  dropdownOpen: { [key: string]: boolean };
    55‚Üí  onTemplateSelect: (templateId: number, template: ColtempData) => void;
    56‚Üí  onShendoClick: (category: string) => void;
    57‚Üí  onOpenCJ: (category: string) => void;
    58‚Üí  onToggleDropdown: (category: string) => void;
    59‚Üí  utg_id: string;
    60‚Üí}
    61‚Üí
    62‚Üíexport interface CTCEnhancedButtonsProps extends CTCButtonsProps {
    63‚Üí  onTemplatePreview: (templateId: number | null) => void;
    64‚Üí}
    65‚Üí
    66‚Üíexport interface CTCShendoProps {
    67‚Üí  category: string | null;
    68‚Üí  templates: { [key: string]: ColtempData[] };
    69‚Üí  activeTemplateId: number | null;
    70‚Üí  onTemplateSelect: (templateId: number, template: ColtempData) => void;
    71‚Üí  utg_id: string;
    72‚Üí}
    73‚Üí
    74‚Üíexport interface CTCShendoPreviewProps {
    75‚Üí  templateId: number | null;
    76‚Üí  template: ColtempData | null;
    77‚Üí  utg_id: string;
    78‚Üí}
    79‚Üí
    80‚Üíexport type CategoryType = 'personal' | 'range' | 'adminpublic';
    81‚Üí
    82‚Üíexport const CATEGORIES: CategoryType[] = ['range', 'adminpublic', 'personal'];
    83‚Üí
    84‚Üíexport const ALL_COLUMNS_TEMPLATE: ColtempData = {
    85‚Üí  coltemp_id: -999,
```

```
     2‚Üí
     3‚Üíimport { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
     4‚Üíimport { useFavaTaniSafe } from '../fava/components/favaTaniPopup/favaTaniConditionalProvider';
     5‚Üíimport FavaPageMaster from '../fava/components/favaPageMaster';
     6‚Üíimport { torna3TableConfig } from '../fava/config/torna3TableConfig';
     7‚Üíimport { createClientComponentClient } from '@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs';
     8‚Üíimport { createTorna3TaniConfig } from './taniContent';
     9‚Üí
    10‚Üíexport default function Torna3Page() {
    11‚Üí  const [nemtorData, setNemtorData] = useState<any[]>([]);
    12‚Üí  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    13‚Üí  const [activeColumns, setActiveColumns] = useState<string[]>([]);
    14‚Üí  const [selectedTemplateId, setSelectedTemplateId] = useState<number | null>(null);
    15‚Üí  const taniState = useFavaTaniSafe()?.state;
    16‚Üí  const supabase = createClientComponentClient();
    17‚Üí
    18‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
    19‚Üí    fetchNemtorUnits();
    20‚Üí    
    21‚Üí    // Listen for template selection events
    22‚Üí    const handleTemplateSelected = async (event: any) => {
    23‚Üí      const { coltemp_id } = event.detail;
    24‚Üí      await applyTemplate(coltemp_id);
    25‚Üí    };
    26‚Üí    
    27‚Üí    const handleTemplateLoaded = async (event: any) => {
    28‚Üí      const { coltemp_id } = event.detail;
    29‚Üí      await applyTemplate(coltemp_id);
    30‚Üí    };
    31‚Üí    
    32‚Üí    const handleShowAll = () => {
    33‚Üí      // Show all columns from the original config
    34‚Üí      setActiveColumns(torna3TableConfig.columns.map(col => col.field));
    35‚Üí      setSelectedTemplateId(null);
    36‚Üí    };
    37‚Üí    
    38‚Üí    window.addEventListener('fava-template-selected', handleTemplateSelected);
    39‚Üí    window.addEventListener('fava-template-loaded', handleTemplateLoaded);
    40‚Üí    window.addEventListener('fava-template-show-all', handleShowAll);
    41‚Üí    
    42‚Üí    // Check URL for initial template
    43‚Üí    const url = new URL(window.location.href);
    44‚Üí    const coltempId = url.searchParams.get('coltemp_id');
    45‚Üí    if (coltempId) {
    46‚Üí      applyTemplate(parseInt(coltempId));
    47‚Üí    } else {
    48‚Üí      // Load all columns by default
    49‚Üí      setActiveColumns(torna3TableConfig.columns.map(col => col.field));
    50‚Üí    }
    51‚Üí    
    52‚Üí    return () => {
    53‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('fava-template-selected', handleTemplateSelected);
    54‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('fava-template-loaded', handleTemplateLoaded);
    55‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('fava-template-show-all', handleShowAll);
    56‚Üí    };
    57‚Üí  }, []);
    58‚Üí
    59‚Üí  const fetchNemtorUnits = async () => {
    60‚Üí    try {
    61‚Üí      const { data, error } = await supabase
    62‚Üí        .from('nemtor_units')
    63‚Üí        .select('*')
    64‚Üí        .order('sort_index', { ascending: true })
    65‚Üí        .order('position_order', { ascending: true });
    66‚Üí
    67‚Üí      if (error) {
    68‚Üí        console.error('Error fetching nemtor units:', error);
    69‚Üí        return;
    70‚Üí      }
    71‚Üí
    72‚Üí      setNemtorData(data || []);
    73‚Üí    } catch (error) {
    74‚Üí      console.error('Error:', error);
    75‚Üí    } finally {
    76‚Üí      setLoading(false);
    77‚Üí    }
    78‚Üí  };
    79‚Üí  
    80‚Üí  const applyTemplate = async (coltempId: number) => {
    81‚Üí    try {
    82‚Üí      // Fetch columns for this template from junction table
    83‚Üí      const { data, error } = await supabase
    84‚Üí        .from('coltemp_denbu_relations')
    85‚Üí        .select(`
    86‚Üí          fk_denbu_column_id,
    87‚Üí          denbu_columns (
    88‚Üí            column_name
    89‚Üí          )
    90‚Üí        `)
    91‚Üí        .eq('fk_coltemp_id', coltempId)
    92‚Üí        .eq('is_visible', true)
    93‚Üí        .order('column_position', { ascending: true });
    94‚Üí        
    95‚Üí      if (error) {
    96‚Üí        console.error('Error fetching template columns:', error);
    97‚Üí        return;
    98‚Üí      }
    99‚Üí      
   100‚Üí      // Extract column names
   101‚Üí      const columnNames = data?.map(item => 
   102‚Üí        (item.denbu_columns as any)?.column_name
   103‚Üí      ).filter(Boolean) || [];
   104‚Üí      
   105‚Üí      setActiveColumns(columnNames);
   106‚Üí      setSelectedTemplateId(coltempId);
   107‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   108‚Üí      console.error('Error applying template:', error);
   109‚Üí    }
   110‚Üí  };
   111‚Üí  
   112‚Üí  // Filter columns based on active template
   113‚Üí  const visibleColumns = activeColumns.length > 0 
   114‚Üí    ? torna3TableConfig.columns.filter(col => activeColumns.includes(col.field))
   115‚Üí    : torna3TableConfig.columns;
   116‚Üí    
   117‚Üí  // Convert nemtor data to table format with only visible columns
   118‚Üí  const data = nemtorData.map(row => 
   119‚Üí    visibleColumns.map(col => {
   120‚Üí      const value = row[col.field as keyof typeof row];
   121‚Üí      
   122‚Üí      // Apply formatting if specified
   123‚Üí      if (col.format && typeof col.format === 'function') {
   124‚Üí        return col.format(value);
   125‚Üí      }
   126‚Üí      
   127‚Üí      return value;
   128‚Üí    })
   129‚Üí  );
   130‚Üí
   131‚Üí  // Generate tooltips for visible columns only
   132‚Üí  const cellTooltips = nemtorData.map(() => 
   133‚Üí    visibleColumns.map(col => `${col.header}: ${col.field}`)
   134‚Üí  );
   135‚Üí
   136‚Üí  // Event handlers
   137‚Üí  const handleCellClick = (rowIndex: number, colIndex: number, value: any) => {
   138‚Üí    console.log(`Cell clicked: Row ${rowIndex}, Col ${colIndex}, Value: ${value}`);
   139‚Üí  };
   140‚Üí
   141‚Üí  const handleHeaderClick = (colIndex: number, headerName: string) => {
   142‚Üí    console.log(`Header clicked: ${headerName} (Column ${colIndex})`);
   143‚Üí  };
   144‚Üí
   145‚Üí  const handleRowClick = (rowIndex: number, rowData: any[]) => {
   146‚Üí    console.log(`Row clicked: ${rowIndex}`, rowData);
   147‚Üí  };
   148‚Üí
   149‚Üí  // Create header rows for visible columns
   150‚Üí  const filteredHeaderRows = [{
   151‚Üí    id: 'main-header',
   152‚Üí    type: 'label',
   153‚Üí    cells: visibleColumns.map(col => ({
   154‚Üí      content: col.header,
   155‚Üí      alignment: col.field.includes('id') || col.field.includes('_at') || col.field.includes('position') || 
   156‚Üí                col.field.includes('level') || col.field.includes('index') || col.field.includes('slot') || 
   157‚Üí                col.field.includes('qty') ? 'center' : 'left'
   158‚Üí    }))
   159‚Üí  }];
   160‚Üí  
   161‚Üí  // Prepare table props
   162‚Üí  const tableProps = {
   163‚Üí    headerRows: filteredHeaderRows,
   164‚Üí    data: data,
   165‚Üí    tableClassName: "nemtor-units-table",
   166‚Üí    theadClassName: "table-header",
   167‚Üí    tbodyClassName: "table-body",
   168‚Üí    thClassName: "header-cell",
   169‚Üí    tdClassName: "data-cell",
   170‚Üí    headerTrClassName: "header-row",
   171‚Üí    bodyTrClassName: "body-row",
   172‚Üí    cellTooltips: cellTooltips,

   178‚Üí  if (loading) {

   180‚Üí  }
   181‚Üí
   182‚Üí  return (
   183‚Üí    <FavaPageMaster
   184‚Üí      pageTitle="Tornado Page Editor System"
   185‚Üí      pageDescription={`${nemtorData.length} units ‚Ä¢ ${visibleColumns.length} of ${torna3TableConfig.columns.length} columns shown ‚Ä¢ Elementor widget tracking`}

   190‚Üí      showShendoBar={true}
   191‚Üí      showFilterControls={true}

   193‚Üí      showPaginationControls={true}
   194‚Üí      showBiriDevInfoBox={true}
   195‚Üí      showTrelnoColumnsDefBox={true}
   196‚Üí      
   197‚Üí      // FavaTani Popup Configuration
   198‚Üí      taniEnabled={true}
   199‚Üí      taniPreset="standard"
   200‚Üí      taniConfig={createTorna3TaniConfig(
   201‚Üí        nemtorData,
   202‚Üí        visibleColumns,
   203‚Üí        torna3TableConfig.columns.length
   204‚Üí      )}
   205‚Üí    >
   206‚Üí      {/* Custom content specific to Nemtor Units */}
   207‚Üí      <div style={{
```

```
     7‚Üí
     8‚Üíinterface ColtempData {
     9‚Üí  coltemp_id: number;
    10‚Üí  coltemp_name: string | null;
    11‚Üí  coltemp_category: string | null;

    18‚Üí
    19‚Üíexport default function FavaColumnTemplateControls() {
    20‚Üí  const [coltempData, setColtempData] = useState<{[key: string]: ColtempData[]}>({});

    25‚Üí  const pathname = usePathname();
    26‚Üí  
    27‚Üí  // Mapping from page paths to UTG IDs
    28‚Üí  // This could be moved to a config file or passed as a prop
    29‚Üí  const getUtgIdForPath = (path: string): string => {
    30‚Üí    const pathToUtgMap: Record<string, string> = {
    31‚Üí      '/torna3': 'utg_torna3',
    32‚Üí      '/torna2': 'utg_torna2',
    33‚Üí      // Add more mappings as needed
    34‚Üí    };
    35‚Üí    return pathToUtgMap[path] || 'utg_default';
    36‚Üí  };
    37‚Üí
    38‚Üí  // Define the 3 categories
    39‚Üí  const categories = ['range', 'adminpublic', 'personal'];

    41‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
    42‚Üí    fetchColtempData();
    43‚Üí    
    44‚Üí    // Check URL for selected template on mount

    47‚Üí    if (coltempId) {
    48‚Üí      setActiveTemplateId(parseInt(coltempId));
    49‚Üí      // Emit event for initial template load
    50‚Üí      const event = new CustomEvent('fava-template-loaded', {
    51‚Üí        detail: { coltemp_id: parseInt(coltempId) }
    52‚Üí      });
    53‚Üí      window.dispatchEvent(event);
    54‚Üí    } else {
    55‚Üí      setActiveTemplateId(-999); // Set hardcoded "all" as active by default
    56‚Üí    }
    57‚Üí  }, []);
    58‚Üí
    59‚Üí  const fetchColtempData = async () => {
    60‚Üí    try {
    61‚Üí      const { data, error } = await supabase
    62‚Üí        .from('coltemps')
    63‚Üí        .select('coltemp_id, coltemp_name, coltemp_category, coltemp_color, coltemp_icon, icon_name, icon_color, count_of_columns')
    64‚Üí        .order('coltemp_id', { ascending: true });
    65‚Üí
    66‚Üí      if (error) throw error;
    67‚Üí
    68‚Üí      // Group data by category
    69‚Üí      const groupedData: {[key: string]: ColtempData[]} = {
    70‚Üí        range: [],
    71‚Üí        adminpublic: [],
    72‚Üí        personal: []
    73‚Üí      };
    74‚Üí
    75‚Üí      data?.forEach(item => {
    76‚Üí        const category = item.coltemp_category?.toLowerCase() || 'range';
    77‚Üí        if (groupedData[category]) {
    78‚Üí          groupedData[category].push(item);
    79‚Üí        }
    80‚Üí      });
    81‚Üí
    82‚Üí      setColtempData(groupedData);
    83‚Üí    } catch (error) {
    84‚Üí      console.error('Error fetching coltemp data:', error);
    85‚Üí    } finally {
    86‚Üí      setLoading(false);
    87‚Üí    }
    88‚Üí  };
    89‚Üí
    90‚Üí  // Create 3 slots per category with empty slot handling

    92‚Üí    const slots = [];
    93‚Üí    
    94‚Üí    // Special handling for range category - hardcode "all" as first slot

    97‚Üí      slots.push({
    98‚Üí        coltemp_id: -999, // Special ID for hardcoded all button
    99‚Üí        coltemp_name: 'all',

   105‚Üí        count_of_columns: 32
   106‚Üí      });
   107‚Üí      
   108‚Üí      // Fill remaining 2 slots with database data
   109‚Üí      for (let i = 0; i < 2; i++) {

   115‚Üí            coltemp_id: -1,

   130‚Üí          slots.push(categoryData[i]);
   131‚Üí        } else {
   132‚Üí          // Empty slot
   133‚Üí          slots.push({
   134‚Üí            coltemp_id: -1,

   244‚Üí          onMouseLeave={(e) => {
   245‚Üí            if (!isMore) {
   246‚Üí              e.currentTarget.style.backgroundColor = coltemp_id === activeTemplateId ? '#86a5e9' : '#ebebeb';
   247‚Üí            }
   248‚Üí          }}
   249‚Üí          onClick={() => {
   250‚Üí            if (isMore) {
   251‚Üí              toggleDropdown(category);
   252‚Üí            } else if (coltemp_id !== -1) {
   253‚Üí              console.log(`Clicked coltemp_id: ${coltemp_id}`);
   254‚Üí              
   255‚Üí              // Special handling for hardcoded "all" button
   256‚Üí              if (coltemp_id === -999) {
   257‚Üí                setActiveTemplateId(-999);
   258‚Üí                // Emit custom event for showing all columns
   259‚Üí                const event = new CustomEvent('fava-template-show-all', {
   260‚Üí                  detail: { action: 'show_all' }
   261‚Üí                });
   262‚Üí                window.dispatchEvent(event);
   263‚Üí                
   264‚Üí                // Remove template from URL to show default view
   265‚Üí                const url = new URL(window.location.href);
   266‚Üí                url.searchParams.delete('coltemp_id');
   267‚Üí                window.history.pushState({}, '', url);
   268‚Üí              } else {
   269‚Üí                setActiveTemplateId(coltemp_id || null);
   270‚Üí                // Regular template selection
   271‚Üí                const event = new CustomEvent('fava-template-selected', {
   272‚Üí                  detail: { coltemp_id, coltemp_name }

   274‚Üí                window.dispatchEvent(event);

   280‚Üí              }

   292‚Üí              }}
   293‚Üí            />
   294‚Üí          )}
   295‚Üí          {renderContent()}
   296‚Üí        </button>
   297‚Üí        
   298‚Üí        {/* Dropdown for overflow items */}
   299‚Üí        {isMore && dropdownOpen[category] && overflowItems.length > 0 && (
   300‚Üí          <div style={{

   302‚Üí            top: '100%',

   309‚Üí          }}>
   310‚Üí            {overflowItems.map((item) => (

   321‚Üí                  gap: '6px'
   322‚Üí                }}

   326‚Üí                  }

```

```

     4‚Üíimport FavaNavToggle from './favaNavToggle';

    17‚Üíimport '../styles/fava-navigation.css';
    18‚Üí
    19‚Üíinterface PureFavaPageMasterProps {
    20‚Üí  // Page configuration
    21‚Üí  pageTitle?: string;
    22‚Üí  pageDescription?: string | ReactNode;
    23‚Üí  documentTitle?: string;
    24‚Üí  
    25‚Üí  // Component visibility
    26‚Üí  showColumnTemplateControls?: boolean;
    27‚Üí  showFilterControls?: boolean;
    28‚Üí  showSearchBox?: boolean;
    29‚Üí  showPaginationControls?: boolean;
    30‚Üí  showBiriDevInfoBox?: boolean;
    31‚Üí  showTrelnoColumnsDefBox?: boolean;
    32‚Üí  showShendoBar?: boolean;
    33‚Üí  showColumnVisibilityMatrix?: boolean;
    34‚Üí  showTable?: boolean;
    35‚Üí

    37‚Üí  tableProps?: any;
    38‚Üí

    46‚Üí  contentPadding?: string;
    47‚Üí  contentStyle?: React.CSSProperties;
    48‚Üí}
    49‚Üí
    50‚Üí/**
    51‚Üí * PureFavaPageMaster - Original Fava template without any Tani popup enhancements
    52‚Üí * 
    53‚Üí * This component preserves the exact original functionality of FavaPageMaster
    54‚Üí * without any modifications or additions. It serves as the fallback component
    55‚Üí * when Tani popup system is disabled or when pure Fava functionality is needed.
    56‚Üí * 
    57‚Üí * This ensures that the base Fava system remains stable and unchanged.
    58‚Üí */
    59‚Üíexport default function PureFavaPageMaster({
    60‚Üí  pageTitle,
    61‚Üí  pageDescription,
    62‚Üí  documentTitle,
    63‚Üí  showColumnTemplateControls = true,
    64‚Üí  showFilterControls = true,
    65‚Üí  showSearchBox = true,
    66‚Üí  showPaginationControls = true,
    67‚Üí  showBiriDevInfoBox = true,
    68‚Üí  showTrelnoColumnsDefBox = true,
    69‚Üí  showShendoBar = true,
    70‚Üí  showColumnVisibilityMatrix = true,
    71‚Üí  showTable = true,
    72‚Üí  tableProps,
    73‚Üí  children,
    74‚Üí  headerContent,
    75‚Üí  toolbarContent,
    76‚Üí  footerContent,
    77‚Üí  contentPadding = '20px',
    78‚Üí  contentStyle = {}
    79‚Üí}: PureFavaPageMasterProps) {
    80‚Üí  const [navVisible, setNavVisible] = useState(true);
    81‚Üí
    82‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
    83‚Üí    // Set document title if provided
    84‚Üí    if (documentTitle) {
    85‚Üí      document.title = documentTitle;
    86‚Üí    }
    87‚Üí    
    88‚Üí    // Check navigation visibility from localStorage
    89‚Üí    const savedVisibility = localStorage.getItem('fava-nav-visible');
    90‚Üí    if (savedVisibility !== null) {
    91‚Üí      setNavVisible(JSON.parse(savedVisibility));
    92‚Üí    }
    93‚Üí    
    94‚Üí    // Listen for navigation visibility changes
    95‚Üí    const handleVisibilityChange = () => {
    96‚Üí      const visibility = localStorage.getItem('fava-nav-visible');
    97‚Üí      if (visibility !== null) {
    98‚Üí        setNavVisible(JSON.parse(visibility));
    99‚Üí      }
   100‚Üí    };
   101‚Üí    
   102‚Üí    // Listen for both storage changes (cross-tab) and custom events (same page)
   103‚Üí    window.addEventListener('storage', handleVisibilityChange);
   104‚Üí    window.addEventListener('fava-nav-toggle', handleVisibilityChange);
   105‚Üí    
   106‚Üí    return () => {
   107‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('storage', handleVisibilityChange);
   108‚Üí      window.removeEventListener('fava-nav-toggle', handleVisibilityChange);
   109‚Üí    };
   110‚Üí  }, [documentTitle]);
   111‚Üí
   112‚Üí  return (
   113‚Üí    <>
   114‚Üí      <FavaNavToggle />
   115‚Üí      <FavaHeader />

   117‚Üí

   126‚Üí          minHeight: '100vh',
   127‚Üí          boxSizing: 'border-box',
   128‚Üí          ...contentStyle
   129‚Üí        }}
```

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

## Fava System & ColumnTemplateControls Investigation Report

**üîç Issue Found:** The ColumnTemplateControls are temporarily disabled in the fava page master system.

### **1. Fava System Overview**
The fava system is a comprehensive data table template system located in `/app/(protected2)/fava/`. It provides:
- Column template management
- Filter controls
- Search functionality
- Pagination
- Table rendering
- Sidebar navigation
- Column visibility matrix

### **2. ColumnTemplateControls System**
The ColumnTemplateControls folder at `/app/(protected2)/fava/components/ColumnTemplateControls/` contains a sophisticated template management system:

**Key Components:**
- `FavaCTCMaster.tsx`: Main controller component that manages template state and events
- `favaCTCButtonsClassic.tsx` & `favaCTCButtonsEnhanced.tsx`: Button rendering components
- `favaCTCShendoActive.tsx` & `favaCTCShendoPreview.tsx`: Shendo display components
- `favaCTCEvents.ts`: Event system for template interactions
- `favaCTCTypes.ts`: TypeScript definitions

**Features:**
- Template categories: 'range', 'adminpublic', 'personal'
- Database integration with `coltemps` and `coltemp_denbu_relations` tables
- UTG ID mapping for different pages (torna3 maps to 'utg_torna3')
- URL parameter handling for template persistence
- Event-driven architecture for template selection

### **3. Torna3 Page Implementation**
The `/torna3` page is properly configured:
- Uses `FavaPageMaster` component correctly
- Has `showColumnTemplateControls={true}` enabled
- Implements proper event listeners for template changes
- Database queries are set up for `nemtor_units` table
- Template application logic is implemented

### **4. Root Cause Analysis**
**The Issue:** In `pureFavaPageMaster.tsx:152-154`, the ColumnTemplateControls are commented out:

```tsx
{/* TEMPORARILY DISABLED FOR TESTING */}
{/* {showColumnTemplateControls && <FavaColumnTemplateControls />}
{showShendoBar && <FavaShendoBar />} */}
```

**Impact:** This prevents the ColumnTemplateControls from rendering on any page using the fava system, including `/torna3`.

### **5. System Architecture Flow**
1. **Torna3 Page** ‚Üí uses `FavaPageMaster` 
2. **FavaPageMaster** ‚Üí uses `PureFavaPageMaster` (when Tani is disabled) or wraps it (when Tani is enabled)
3. **PureFavaPageMaster** ‚Üí should render `FavaColumnTemplateControls` but it's commented out

### **6. Solution Required**
To restore ColumnTemplateControls functionality on `/torna3`:

**File:** `/app/(protected2)/fava/components/pureFavaPageMaster.tsx`  
**Action:** Uncomment lines 153-154:
```tsx
{showColumnTemplateControls && <FavaColumnTemplateControls />}
{showShendoBar && <FavaShendoBar />}
```

### **7. Additional Observations**
- The system includes both a legacy component (`favaColumnTemplateControls.tsx`) and the new modular system in the `ColumnTemplateControls/` folder
- There's a "NEW MULTI-DECKER SYSTEM" testing area in the legacy component
- The system is fully integrated with database tables and URL parameter handling
- Template selection triggers custom events that the torna3 page listens for correctly

**Conclusion:** The ColumnTemplateControls system is fully functional and properly integrated with the torna3 page. The only issue is that the controls are temporarily disabled in the page master component for testing purposes.

Result:

```
1‚Üí'use client';
     2‚Üí
     3‚Üíimport React, { useState } from 'react';
     4‚Üíimport { ICON_REGISTRY, EXPANDED_ICON_CATEGORIES } from './iconRegistry';
     5‚Üíimport { IconSelectorProps, IconCategory } from './types/iconTypes';
     6‚Üíimport IconPreview from './iconPreview';
     7‚Üí
     8‚Üíexport default function IconSelector({ 
     9‚Üí  selectedIcon, 
    10‚Üí  selectedColor = '#666666',
    11‚Üí  onIconChange, 
    12‚Üí  onColorChange,
    13‚Üí  category,
    14‚Üí  size = 16 
    15‚Üí}: IconSelectorProps) {
    16‚Üí  const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);
    17‚Üí  const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState<IconCategory | 'all'>('all');
    18‚Üí
    19‚Üí  const filteredIcons = ICON_REGISTRY.filter(icon => {
    20‚Üí    if (category && !icon.usageContexts.includes(category)) return false;
    21‚Üí    if (activeCategory === 'all') return true;
    22‚Üí    return icon.category === activeCategory;
    23‚Üí  });
    24‚Üí
    25‚Üí  const categories = EXPANDED_ICON_CATEGORIES;
    26‚Üí
    27‚Üí  const defaultColors = [
    28‚Üí    '#666666', '#000000', '#ffffff', '#ff0000', '#00ff00', '#0000ff',
    29‚Üí    '#ffff00', '#ff00ff', '#00ffff', '#800080', '#ffa500', '#800000'
    30‚Üí  ];
    31‚Üí
    32‚Üí  return (
    33‚Üí    <div style={{ position: 'relative', display: 'inline-block' }}>
    34‚Üí      {/* Current Selection Display */}
    35‚Üí      <div
    36‚Üí        onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
    37‚Üí        style={{
    38‚Üí          display: 'flex',
    39‚Üí          alignItems: 'center',
    40‚Üí          gap: '8px',
    41‚Üí          padding: '8px 12px',
    42‚Üí          border: '1px solid #ccc',
    43‚Üí          borderRadius: '4px',
    44‚Üí          backgroundColor: '#fff',
    45‚Üí          cursor: 'pointer',
    46‚Üí          minWidth: '120px'
    47‚Üí        }}
    48‚Üí      >
    49‚Üí        <IconPreview 
    50‚Üí          iconName={selectedIcon} 
    51‚Üí          iconColor={selectedColor} 
    52‚Üí          size={size} 
    53‚Üí        />
    54‚Üí        <span style={{ fontSize: '14px', color: '#333', flex: 1 }}>
    55‚Üí          {selectedIcon || 'Select icon'}
    56‚Üí        </span>
    57‚Üí        <span style={{ fontSize: '12px', color: '#999' }}>‚ñº</span>
    58‚Üí      </div>
    59‚Üí
    60‚Üí      {/* Dropdown Panel */}
    61‚Üí      {isOpen && (
    62‚Üí        <div
    63‚Üí          style={{
    64‚Üí            position: 'absolute',
    65‚Üí            top: '100%',
    66‚Üí            left: 0,
    67‚Üí            right: 0,
    68‚Üí            backgroundColor: '#fff',
    69‚Üí            border: '1px solid #ccc',
    70‚Üí            borderRadius: '4px',
    71‚Üí            boxShadow: '0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)',
    72‚Üí            zIndex: 1000,
    73‚Üí            maxHeight: '400px',
    74‚Üí            overflowY: 'auto',
    75‚Üí            minWidth: '300px'
    76‚Üí          }}
    77‚Üí        >
    78‚Üí          {/* Category Tabs */}
    79‚Üí          <div style={{ 
    80‚Üí            display: 'flex', 
    81‚Üí            borderBottom: '1px solid #eee',
    82‚Üí            backgroundColor: '#f8f8f8'
    83‚Üí          }}>
    84‚Üí            {categories.map(cat => (
    85‚Üí              <button
    86‚Üí                key={cat}
    87‚Üí                onClick={() => setActiveCategory(cat)}
    88‚Üí                style={{
    89‚Üí                  padding: '8px 12px',
    90‚Üí                  border: 'none',
    91‚Üí                  backgroundColor: activeCategory === cat ? '#fff' : 'transparent',
    92‚Üí                  borderBottom: activeCategory === cat ? '2px solid #007cba' : '2px solid transparent',
    93‚Üí                  fontSize: '12px',
    94‚Üí                  cursor: 'pointer',
    95‚Üí                  textTransform: 'capitalize'
    96‚Üí                }}
    97‚Üí              >
    98‚Üí                {cat}
    99‚Üí              </button>
   100‚Üí            ))}
   101‚Üí          </div>
   102‚Üí
   103‚Üí          {/* Icon Grid */}
   104‚Üí          <div style={{ 
   105‚Üí            display: 'grid', 
   106‚Üí            gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(6, 1fr)',
   107‚Üí            gap: '4px',
   108‚Üí            padding: '12px'
   109‚Üí          }}>
   110‚Üí            {filteredIcons.map(icon => (
   111‚Üí              <div
   112‚Üí                key={icon.iconName}
   113‚Üí                onClick={() => {
   114‚Üí                  onIconChange(icon.iconName);
   115‚Üí                  setIsOpen(false);
   116‚Üí                }}
   117‚Üí                style={{
   118‚Üí                  display: 'flex',
   119‚Üí                  flexDirection: 'column',
   120‚Üí                  alignItems: 'center',
   121‚Üí                  gap: '4px',
   122‚Üí                  padding: '8px',
   123‚Üí                  cursor: 'pointer',
   124‚Üí                  borderRadius: '4px',
   125‚Üí                  backgroundColor: selectedIcon === icon.iconName ? '#e3f2fd' : 'transparent',
   126‚Üí                  border: selectedIcon === icon.iconName ? '1px solid #007cba' : '1px solid transparent'
   127‚Üí                }}
   128‚Üí                title={icon.displayName}
   129‚Üí              >
   130‚Üí                <IconPreview 
   131‚Üí                  iconName={icon.iconName} 
   132‚Üí                  iconColor={selectedColor} 
   133‚Üí                  size={size} 
   134‚Üí                />
   135‚Üí                <span style={{ fontSize: '10px', color: '#666', textAlign: 'center' }}>
   136‚Üí                  {icon.displayName}
   137‚Üí                </span>
   138‚Üí              </div>
   139‚Üí            ))}
   140‚Üí          </div>
   141‚Üí
   142‚Üí          {/* Color Picker */}
   143‚Üí          <div style={{ 
   144‚Üí            borderTop: '1px solid #eee',
   145‚Üí            padding: '12px'
   146‚Üí          }}>
   147‚Üí            <div style={{ fontSize: '12px', color: '#666', marginBottom: '8px' }}>
   148‚Üí              Color:
   149‚Üí            </div>
   150‚Üí            <div style={{ 
   151‚Üí              display: 'grid', 
   152‚Üí              gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(6, 1fr)',
   153‚Üí              gap: '4px'
   154‚Üí            }}>
   155‚Üí              {defaultColors.map(color => (
   156‚Üí                <div
   157‚Üí                  key={color}
   158‚Üí                  onClick={() => onColorChange(color)}
   159‚Üí                  style={{
   160‚Üí                    width: '24px',
```

```
1‚Üíimport { LUCIDE_ICON_MAP, ICON_REGISTRY } from './iconRegistry';
     2‚Üíimport { IconCategory } from './types/iconTypes';
     3‚Üí
     4‚Üíexport const isValidIconName = (iconName: string): boolean => {
     5‚Üí  return iconName in LUCIDE_ICON_MAP;
     6‚Üí};
     7‚Üí
     8‚Üíexport const isValidHexColor = (color: string): boolean => {
     9‚Üí  const hexPattern = /^#([A-Fa-f0-9]{6}|[A-Fa-f0-9]{3})$/;
    10‚Üí  return hexPattern.test(color);
    11‚Üí};
    12‚Üí
    13‚Üíexport const normalizeHexColor = (color: string): string => {
    14‚Üí  if (!color) return '#666666';
    15‚Üí  
    16‚Üí  // Remove any whitespace
    17‚Üí  color = color.trim();
    18‚Üí  
    19‚Üí  // Add # if missing
    20‚Üí  if (!color.startsWith('#')) {
    21‚Üí    color = '#' + color;
    22‚Üí  }
    23‚Üí  
    24‚Üí  // Validate and return default if invalid
    25‚Üí  if (!isValidHexColor(color)) {
    26‚Üí    return '#666666';
    27‚Üí  }
    28‚Üí  
    29‚Üí  return color.toLowerCase();
    30‚Üí};
    31‚Üí
    32‚Üíexport const getIconsByCategory = (category: IconCategory) => {
    33‚Üí  return ICON_REGISTRY.filter(icon => icon.category === category);
    34‚Üí};
    35‚Üí
    36‚Üíexport const getIconsByUsageContext = (context: string) => {
    37‚Üí  return ICON_REGISTRY.filter(icon => 
    38‚Üí    icon.usageContexts.includes(context)
    39‚Üí  );
    40‚Üí};
    41‚Üí
    42‚Üíexport const getIconDisplayName = (iconName: string): string => {
    43‚Üí  const icon = ICON_REGISTRY.find(icon => icon.iconName === iconName);
    44‚Üí  return icon?.displayName || iconName;
    45‚Üí};
    46‚Üí
    47‚Üíexport const getDefaultIconForContext = (context: string): string => {
    48‚Üí  const contextIcons = getIconsByUsageContext(context);
    49‚Üí  
    50‚Üí  if (contextIcons.length === 0) return 'circle';
    51‚Üí  
    52‚Üí  // Prefer common shapes for defaults
    53‚Üí  const preferredDefaults = ['circle', 'square', 'star'];
    54‚Üí  for (const preferred of preferredDefaults) {
    55‚Üí    const found = contextIcons.find(icon => icon.iconName === preferred);
    56‚Üí    if (found) return found.iconName;
    57‚Üí  }
    58‚Üí  
    59‚Üí  return contextIcons[0].iconName;
    60‚Üí};
    61‚Üí
    62‚Üíexport const validateIconData = (iconName?: string, iconColor?: string) => {
    63‚Üí  const validIconName = iconName && isValidIconName(iconName) ? iconName : undefined;
    64‚Üí  const validIconColor = normalizeHexColor(iconColor || '#666666');
    65‚Üí  
    66‚Üí  return {
    67‚Üí    iconName: validIconName,
    68‚Üí    iconColor: validIconColor,
    69‚Üí    isValid: validIconName !== undefined
    70‚Üí  };
    71‚Üí};
    72‚Üí
    73‚Üíexport const generateIconSql = () => {
    74‚Üí  const insertStatements = ICON_REGISTRY.map(icon => {
    75‚Üí    const usageContextsArray = `{${icon.usageContexts.map(ctx => `"${ctx}"`).join(',')}}`;
    76‚Üí    return `INSERT INTO ui_icons (icon_name, display_name, category, usage_contexts) VALUES ('${icon.iconName}', '${icon.displayName}', '${icon.category}', '${usageContextsArray}');`;
    77‚Üí  });
    78‚Üí  
    79‚Üí  return insertStatements.join('\n');
    80‚Üí};
    81‚Üí
    82‚Üíexport const getExpandedIconCount = () => {
    83‚Üí  return ICON_REGISTRY.length;
    84‚Üí};
```

**Location:** `/app/(protected2)/fava/components/icons/`

**Files Found:**
- `iconRegistry.ts` - ‚úÖ **SAFE** (all imports commented out)
- `iconPreview.tsx` - ‚úÖ **SAFE** (all imports commented out)

- `/app/icon.png`
- `/app/favicon.ico`

### **9. Server Safety Verification**
**Cannot Cause Crashes:** The icon system is completely neutered:
1. No lucide-react imports are active
2. All icon components return safe placeholders
3. No dynamic icon loading occurs
4. No server-side icon rendering happens

## Server Investigation Results

**Current Status:** The development server is not running, causing all pages to appear down.

### **Findings:**

1. **‚úÖ Port 3000 is Available** - No process is currently using port 3000
2. **‚úÖ Server Logs Look Normal** - Previous runs show successful startup and page compilation
3. **‚úÖ Server Starts Successfully** - `npm run dev` initializes without errors and reports "Ready in 1341ms"
4. **‚ùå Server Stops Immediately** - Despite successful startup, the server process terminates

### **Root Cause:**
The server appears to start correctly but then terminates immediately after startup. This suggests either:
- A silent crash occurring after initialization
- Process termination due to an unhandled error
- Background process management issue

### **Immediate Solution:**
The server needs to be restarted. The startup process works correctly, but the server process isn't staying alive.

**Next Steps:**
1. Start the server again with `npm run dev`
2. Monitor the process to see if it stays running
3. If it crashes again, check for any error handling issues in the codebase

The server infrastructure appears healthy - this looks like a process management issue rather than a code problem.

Thanks ‚Äî based on that output:

> ‚úÖ **No crash is being reported in the terminal.**
> ‚úÖ The dev server *says* it's running and accessible at `http://localhost:3000`
> ‚ùå But you're likely seeing a **blank page** or browser crash when you try to view it.

Let‚Äôs troubleshoot step-by-step:

---

### ‚úÖ Step 1: Check Browser Console (Right Now)

Open `http://localhost:3000`, then:

1. Open **DevTools** ‚Üí **Console tab**
2. Look for:

   * Red errors like `ReferenceError`, `Hydration failed`, `Module not found`, `Unexpected token`, `useEffect error`, etc.
   * Any stack trace referencing one of your components or icons
3. Copy-paste or screenshot the **first red error**, if any.

---

### ‚úÖ Step 2: Try Rendering the Most Minimal Page

Create a bare page to test if **just the app shell** works:

```tsx
// pages/index.tsx
export default function Home() {
  return <div>Hello from a blank page</div>
}
```

Does this render without crashing?

If yes ‚Üí the issue is **in your actual page/component tree**, not the Next.js setup.

---

### ‚úÖ Step 3: Check for Layout, `_app.tsx`, or `_document.tsx` Issues

Temporarily replace your `pages/_app.tsx` with:

```tsx
// pages/_app.tsx
import type { AppProps } from 'next/app'

export default function App({ Component, pageProps }: AppProps) {
  return <Component {...pageProps} />
}
```

And your `_document.tsx` with:

```tsx
// pages/_document.tsx
import { Html, Head, Main, NextScript } from 'next/document'

export default function Document() {
  return (
    <Html>
      <Head />
      <body>
        <Main />
        <NextScript />
      </body>
    </Html>
  )
}
```

Sometimes broken Head injections or wrappers (like a theme provider or Lucide context) cause silent rendering failure.

---

### ‚úÖ Step 4: Check for Problem Imports (like `lucide-react`)

You mentioned `lucide-react` earlier was crashing things.

Try:

```bash
npm uninstall lucide-react
```

Then in a page where you‚Äôre importing any icons:

```tsx
// ‚ùå Comment this out completely if present
// import { AlertCircle } from "lucide-react"
```

Does the app now render?

If yes ‚Üí Lucide is likely incompatible or causing hydration errors. You could:

* Lazy-load the icons with `dynamic()`
* Use SVG inline instead
* Pin to a stable older version

---

### ‚úÖ Step 5: Inspect `next.config.js`, Babel, or Tailwind

Misconfigurations in:

* `next.config.js` (especially with `experimental`, `webpack`, or `babel`)
* `tailwind.config.js` with overly aggressive purge
* `babel.config.js` with bad presets/plugins

Temporarily reset them to defaults and test again.

---

Would you like to upload your `pages/_app.tsx`, `next.config.js`, and one broken page so I can look directly?

Otherwise, let me know what appears in the **browser console**, since that‚Äôs the likely source of truth here.

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Based on my investigation and ChatGPT's suggestions, here's my analysis:

## **ChatGPT's suggestions vs. actual problem:**

**ChatGPT assumes:** Server is running but pages crash in browser  
**Reality:** Server process terminates immediately after startup

## **Best suggestions ranked:**

### **ü•á #1: Step 5 - Check `next.config.js` and config files**
**Most likely culprit.** Server crashes during startup usually indicate:
- Bad Next.js configuration 
- Webpack config issues
- TypeScript/build configuration problems
- Environment variable issues

### **ü•à #2: Step 3 - Check Layout/`_app.tsx` issues**  
**Second most likely.** Server-side rendering errors in:
- `app/layout.tsx` (you're using App Router)
- Global providers/contexts
- Initial component hydration issues

### **ü•â #3: Step 2 - Minimal page test**
**Good for isolation** once server stays running. Would help identify if specific pages cause crashes.

### **‚ùå Less relevant:**
- **Step 1 (Browser console)** - Won't help if server isn't running
- **Step 4 (lucide-react)** - Already confirmed completely disabled

## **Missing from ChatGPT's list:**
- **Check for unhandled async operations** in server components
- **Environment variable issues** (`.env.local` problems)
- **Database connection issues** causing startup crashes
- **Node.js version compatibility** with Next.js 15.3.2

## **My recommendation:**
Start with **config files** (`next.config.ts`, `tsconfig.json`, `.env.local`) then check **layout.tsx** and **app structure** for server-side issues. The browser debugging comes after we get the server to stay alive.

## Configuration Analysis Report

**üîç FINDINGS:** All configuration files appear clean, but I found a potential compatibility issue.

### **‚úÖ Configuration Files Status:**

**1. next.config.ts** - ‚úÖ **CLEAN**
- Minimal default configuration
- No problematic webpack, experimental, or babel configs
- No custom modifications that could cause crashes

**2. tsconfig.json** - ‚úÖ **CLEAN**  
- Standard Next.js 15 TypeScript configuration
- Proper bundler module resolution
- No problematic compiler options

**3. .env.local** - ‚úÖ **CLEAN**
- Valid Supabase environment variables
- No syntax errors or missing values
- Proper key formats

**4. postcss.config.mjs** - ‚úÖ **CLEAN**
- Standard Tailwind CSS v4 configuration
- No problematic PostCSS plugins

### **üö® POTENTIAL ISSUE FOUND:**

**React 19 + Next.js 15.3.2 Compatibility**

**package.json:34-35**
```json
"react": "^19.0.0",
"react-dom": "^19.0.0",
```

**Tailwind CSS v4 + PostCSS Configuration**
```json
"@tailwindcss/postcss": "^4",
"tailwindcss": "^4",
```

### **Problem Analysis:**
1. **React 19** is very new and may have compatibility issues with:
   - Next.js 15.3.2 server-side rendering
   - Supabase auth helpers
   - TipTap editor components
   - Other third-party libraries

2. **Tailwind CSS v4** is in alpha/beta and may cause build instability

3. **Node.js 18.20.8** is compatible with the specified `"node": "18.x"` engine

### **Most Likely Root Cause:**
The server starts successfully but crashes during the first render/compilation phase due to React 19 incompatibility with one of your dependencies or Next.js SSR.

### **Recommended Fix Priority:**
1. **Downgrade React to 18.x** (most stable with Next.js 15)
2. **Consider downgrading Tailwind CSS to v3** if issues persist
3. **Check specific component compatibility** with React 19

The configuration files themselves are not the problem - it's the cutting-edge dependency versions causing runtime compatibility issues.

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

## Server Status & /torna3 Analysis

**üîç CONTRADICTORY FINDINGS:**

### **Server Status:**
- ‚úÖ **Server IS running** (Node.js process 12060 on port 3000)
- ‚úÖ **Both pages return HTTP 200** from server-side
- ‚úÖ `/tornado` works in browser
- ‚ùå `/torna3` shows "site can't be reached" in browser

### **Most Likely Cause:**

**üéØ Client-Side JavaScript Crash in /torna3**

This matches **ChatGPT's Step 1 suggestion** - the server renders the page successfully, but the browser crashes during hydration/client-side JavaScript execution.

### **Key Differences Between Pages:**

**`/tornado` (Working):**
- Uses simple components: `WaterTable`, `MarzdiStickyMenu`
- Standard React patterns with `useAuth`, `useState`, `useEffect`
- No complex template system

**`/torna3` (Crashing):**
- Uses complex **Fava system**: `FavaPageMaster`, `useFavaTaniSafe`
- Template management with `torna3TableConfig`
- Advanced popup system with `favaTaniConditionalProvider`
- Database queries with `nemtor_units` table

### **Root Cause Analysis:**

**Most likely:** The Fava system components are causing client-side JavaScript errors that crash the browser tab, making it appear as if the server is down.

**Specific suspects:**
1. **`useFavaTaniSafe()` hook** - Complex state management
2. **`FavaPageMaster`** - Template rendering system
3. **Database queries** - `nemtor_units` table access
4. **Template system** - Column template management

### **Matches ChatGPT's Suggestion:**
‚úÖ **Step 1: Check Browser Console** - This is exactly what's needed to see the JavaScript errors crashing the page.

**Next Action:** Open `/torna3` in browser and check DevTools Console for the red error messages causing the crash.

_**Agent (claude-opus-4-20250514)**_

**üéØ ROOT CAUSE FOUND:** Missing Next.js build files!

## The Problem:
The server is running but **Next.js hasn't built the client-side JavaScript bundles**. The 404 errors show:
- `/_next/static/css/app/layout.css` - Missing
- `/_next/static/chunks/app-pages-internals.js` - Missing  
- `/_next/static/chunks/main-app.js` - Missing
- `/_next/static/chunks/app/layout.js` - Missing

## Why /tornado works but /torna3 doesn't:
- `/tornado` is in `app/(protected)/` directory
- `/torna3` is in `app/(protected2)/` directory

The build system likely has cached files for `(protected)` but not for `(protected2)`.

## Solution:

_**Agent (claude-opus-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Bash** Clear Next.js build cache

`rm -rf .next`

`npm run dev`

## üö® CRITICAL ISSUE FOUND: Missing Required Error Components

### **The Problem:**
Next.js 15 App Router requires these files for proper error handling, but they're **completely missing**:

1. **`app/error.tsx`** - ‚ùå **MISSING**
2. **`app/not-found.tsx`** - ‚ùå **MISSING**
3. **`app/global-error.tsx`** - ‚ùå **MISSING** (optional but recommended)

### **Additional Issues:**
- **External CSS dependencies** in layout.tsx may be failing to load:
  - `https://valueoffershq.com/wp-json/snefuru/v1/css/bespoke`
  - `https://valueoffershq.com/wp-content/ketch/ketch-styles.css`

### **Immediate Fix Required:**

You need to create these missing error components:

**1. Create `app/error.tsx`:**
```tsx
'use client';

export default function Error({
  error,
  reset,
}: {
  error: Error & { digest?: string };
  reset: () => void;
}) {
  return (
    <div>
      <h2>Something went wrong!</h2>
      <button onClick={() => reset()}>Try again</button>
    </div>
  );
}
```

**2. Create `app/not-found.tsx`:**
```tsx
export default function NotFound() {
  return (
    <div>
      <h2>Page Not Found</h2>
      <p>Could not find the requested resource.</p>
    </div>
  );
}
```

**3. Create `app/global-error.tsx`:**
```tsx
'use client';

export default function GlobalError({
  error,
  reset,
}: {
  error: Error & { digest?: string };
  reset: () => void;
}) {
  return (
    <html>
      <body>
        <h2>Something went wrong!</h2>
        <button onClick={() => reset()}>Try again</button>
      </body>
    </html>
  );
}
```

**This is exactly what ChatGPT's Step 3 identified** - missing layout/error components causing the "missing required error components" message and infinite refresh loop.

Without these files, Next.js 15 App Router cannot properly handle any errors, causing the entire application to fail.

## Fava System Investigation Report

### **üîç Problem Identified:**

The column template controls are **not appearing on /torna3** because they are **temporarily disabled** in the fava page master system.

### **üìÅ Current System Architecture:**

**1. New ColumnTemplateControls Folder Structure:**
- `/app/(protected2)/fava/components/ColumnTemplateControls/`
- Contains modern, well-organized components:
  - `FavaCTCMaster.tsx` - Main controller component
  - `favaCTCButtonsClassic.tsx` & `favaCTCButtonsEnhanced.tsx` - Button components
  - `favaCTCShendoActive.tsx` & `favaCTCShendoPreview.tsx` - Shendo display components
  - `favaCTCEvents.ts` - Event system
  - `favaCTCTypes.ts` - TypeScript definitions
  - `index.ts` - Proper exports

**2. Old Legacy Component:**
- `/app/(protected2)/fava/components/favaColumnTemplateControls.tsx`
- Contains similar functionality but less organized

### **üö® Root Cause Analysis:**

**File:** `/app/(protected2)/fava/components/pureFavaPageMaster.tsx:152-154`

```tsx
{/* TEMPORARILY DISABLED FOR TESTING */}
{/* {showColumnTemplateControls && <FavaColumnTemplateControls />}
{showShendoBar && <FavaShendoBar />} */}
```

**Issues:**
1. **Column template controls are commented out** in `pureFavaPageMaster.tsx`
2. **Still imports the old component** (`favaColumnTemplateControls.tsx`) instead of the new `ColumnTemplateControls/` folder
3. **No imports from the new ColumnTemplateControls folder** anywhere in the codebase
4. **New components are not being utilized** despite being properly structured

### **üîÑ System Flow Analysis:**

**Current Flow:**
1. `/torna3` page calls `FavaPageMaster` with `showColumnTemplateControls={true}`
2. `FavaPageMaster` delegates to `PureFavaPageMaster`
3. `PureFavaPageMaster` has the controls **commented out** (lines 152-154)
4. **Nothing renders** = no buttons visible

**Expected Flow:**
1. Import new `FavaCTCMaster` from `ColumnTemplateControls/`
2. Use `FavaCTCMaster` instead of old `FavaColumnTemplateControls`
3. Enable the controls in `pureFavaPageMaster.tsx`

### **üí° Required Modifications:**

**1. Update imports in `pureFavaPageMaster.tsx`:**
```tsx
// Replace this:
import FavaColumnTemplateControls from './favaColumnTemplateControls';

// With this:
import { FavaCTCMaster } from './ColumnTemplateControls';
```

**2. Uncomment and update the disabled section:**
```tsx
// Replace lines 152-154:
{/* {showColumnTemplateControls && <FavaColumnTemplateControls />}
{showShendoBar && <FavaShendoBar />} */}

// With:
{showColumnTemplateControls && <FavaCTCMaster>{/* render logic */}</FavaCTCMaster>}
{showShendoBar && <FavaShendoBar />}
```

**3. Integrate the new component architecture:**
The new `FavaCTCMaster` uses a render prop pattern that needs proper integration with the existing fava system.

### **üéØ Summary:**
The new `ColumnTemplateControls/` folder is properly structured and ready to use, but the fava page master system is still importing the old component and has the controls disabled for testing. The migration to the new system was never completed.

```
   154‚Üí              {({ state, handlers }) => (
   155‚Üí                <div style={{
   156‚Üí                  width: '100%',
   157‚Üí                  height: '400px',
   158‚Üí                  border: '1px solid #000',
   159‚Üí                  backgroundColor: '#5a0e15'
   160‚Üí                }}>
   161‚Üí                  <div style={{
   162‚Üí                    color: '#fff',
   163‚Üí                    float: 'left',
   164‚Üí                    width: '100px'
   165‚Üí                  }}>
   166‚Üí                    div.coltemp_board
   167‚Üí                  </div>
   168‚Üí                  <div style={{
   169‚Üí                    display: 'flex',
   170‚Üí                    flexWrap: 'wrap',
   171‚Üí                    padding: '16px',
   172‚Üí                    gap: '8px',
   173‚Üí                    backgroundColor: '#fff',
   174‚Üí                    float: 'left'
   175‚Üí                  }}>
   176‚Üí                    <strong>db tables:</strong> coltemps AND denbu_columns
   177‚Üí                    {state.loading ? (
   178‚Üí                      <div>Loading coltemp data...</div>
   179‚Üí                    ) : (
   180‚Üí                      ['range', 'adminpublic', 'personal'].map((category) => {
   181‚Üí                        const categoryData = state.templates[category] || [];
   182‚Üí                        const slots = handlers.createSlots(categoryData, category);
   183‚Üí                        
   184‚Üí                        return (
   185‚Üí                          <div key={category} style={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '8px' }}>
   186‚Üí                            <span style={{ borderLeft: '3px solid #ccc', height: '100%', margin: '0 8px' }}></span>
   187‚Üí                            {category}
   188‚Üí                            <span
   189‚Üí                              style={{
   190‚Üí                                color: '#dc2626',
   191‚Üí                                fontSize: '12px',
   192‚Üí                                textDecoration: 'underline',
   193‚Üí                                marginLeft: '8px',
   194‚Üí                                marginRight: '8px',
   195‚Üí                                cursor: 'pointer'
   196‚Üí                              }}
   197‚Üí                              onClick={() => handlers.handleShendoClick(category)}
   198‚Üí                            >
   199‚Üí                              shendo
   200‚Üí                            </span>
   201‚Üí                          </div>
   202‚Üí                        );
   203‚Üí                      })
   204‚Üí                    )}
   205‚Üí                  </div>
   206‚Üí                </div>
   207‚Üí              )}
   208‚Üí            </FavaCTCMaster>
   209‚Üí          )}
   210‚Üí          {showShendoBar && <FavaShendoBar />}
   211‚Üí          
   212‚Üí          {showColumnVisibilityMatrix && <FavaColVisMatMainBar />}
   213‚Üí          {showFilterControls && <FavaFilterControls />}
```
